programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: Historically, mining has been a very dangerous and labor-intensive process. Now, with the evolution of engineering, colossal machines have made the unthinkable possible. Engineering experts share the development and functions of gearless mill drives, giant metal shredders, and explosive-clearing vehicles.

programme.title: Colossal Machines
programme.desc: A huge part of our economy is reliant upon freight transport. Industries from all over the world depend on freight aircraft, offshore vessels and electric trains to increase overall productivity. Experts investigate how these colossal transporters are designed to carry massive amounts of goods quickly and efficiently.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: The UKs engineering wonders revealed: including innovative electric flying machines, ingenious skyscrapers, the secrets of Londons Tower Bridge, a 57 billion pound railway and a mega-stadium with a surprising historical twist.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Explore the engineering wonders of Europes northernmost region, from Icelands epic lava-defying barriers to Finlands record-breaking vertical factory. This spectacular journey uncovers the Nordics boldest builds including the construction of the worlds largest wooden city and a Swedish ferry that doesnt just sail—it flies.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: For 28 years, the horrifying case of a young man who was burned alive sat on a shelf in the Atlanta Police Department. Without a name for him, the case remained inactive. Now, investigators have teamed up with the DNA Doe Project to attempt to identify the "man on fire" and at last provide his family with resolution.

programme.title: Naming the Dead
programme.desc: A convicted serial killer, Larry Eyler, confessed to the murder of more than 20 men across Illinois and Indiana in the 1980s. But several of his victims remained unidentified for decades. Now, after years of frustrated efforts, Newton County Coroner Scott McCord enlists the help of the DNA Doe Project to try and identify one of the last unknown victims and return him to his family.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Enormous ancient terraces made of volcanic rocks in West Java, Indonesia, have origins shrouded in mystery. Hundreds of human skeletal remains unearthed on the island of St. Helena reveal a dark and sorrowful past. In the Persian gulf, a blood-red beach on Hormuz Island ignites wild speculation. Mysterious penguin remains are discovered in a place beyond the reach of these short-legged creatures.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Findings include a small volcanic island off coast of Edinburgh with a dark past; elaborate ancient Egyptian style burials on Sudans Sai Island. A bronze device recovered from a long, lost shipwreck is actually an ancient analog computer. Scientists investigating the sudden disappearance of sharks around Californian islands reveal the interesting connection between orcas and great white sharks.

From rehearsal to premiere, voyage with Moana in the films first Broadway-style adaptation. Experience the inspiration behind bringing the world of "Coco" to life. And get a glimpse into the realm of illusions creating grim grinning ghosts on the high seas.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Sydney is experiencing one of the rainiest seasons on record. With violent storms closing down 2 runways, an incoming flight relays a distress call to the Integrated Operations Centre. A man has suffered an apparent heart attack on board. Will the plane be able to land in this weather? Later, a fire training drill turns into a real emergency as an on board fire is reported from another plane.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: With weekend vacationers and commuters returning home, Friday is always a busy day at the airport. More passengers means more problems, keeping the Duty Managers on high alert. Today its an air ambulance emergency, security breaches, illegal drugs and a shouting passenger facing a ban from the airline shes booked to fly on.

Follow the drama and adrenaline of the toughest and fearcest fights in savannah, jungles and water. It is an ultimate survival with no rules whatsoever. Uncover the extraordinary motivations and strategies used by the animal world.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Despite their ancient appearance, reptiles are creatures full of surprises and sophistication. Much like dinosaurs, reptiles are hugely efficient hunters.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: When on the hunt, snakes judge to perfection the very instant that separates life from death. Venomous snakes are one of the most lethal animals on the planet.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Wolves are a supreme example of cooperative hunting, their efficiency based on hierarchy within a pack that demands loyalty.

programme.title: Animal Fight Club

With exclusive user generated content and footage from top wildlife filmmakers, this episode sheds new light on the fiercest fights Mother Nature has to offer, proving that its not always the animal you expect that ends up coming out on top …

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads into the mangroves to discover which animal is truly built to survive the mud and muck. He encounters a feisty mud crab with huge pincers and catches a shovel-nosed ray with his bare hands. Finally, Phil faces a creature we all love to hate—the mosquito—and discovers theres more to these tiny bloodsuckers than meets the eye.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads to the mysterious blue depths to discover which animal dominates the sea. His first encounter is with a tiger shark, the notorious hunter shaped like a torpedo and armed with ferocious teeth! Next, Phil dives with a group of magnificent manta rays and listens to the songs of one of the largest creatures on Earth, the majestic humpback whale.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how lions hunt large prey like buffalo and zebra, offering new perspectives on the way these predators stalk, chase and kill. A lone lioness relies on cunning to feed her newborn cubs, whilst a fearless pride tries to take down the biggest prey of all, a giant African elephant.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest. Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how Nile crocodiles hunt, offering new perspectives on the patient and precise tactics they use when ambushing migratory herds of wildebeest and zebra that pass through their territories. A male crocodile must target large prey in a bid to survive the harshest time of the year.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: The lines between hunter and hunted become blurred in this epic safari. Hold on to your seats as an elephant charges through the bush with a lion dangling from its tusks. Watch as male leopards engage in a turf war, and a pack of hyenas bully a lion off of his buffalo kill. The safari intensifies as a leopard, wild dogs and hyenas fight for the same kill in an astonishing display of raw nature.

programme.title: Killer Safari
programme.desc: Lions kill four buffaloes in a stampede, while in another drying river a buffalo fights off five of the big cats. As the dry winter looms, heading out on a game drive means checking in at all the remaining waterholes. This is where the action plays out. Each event is unpacked and explained, offering a highly charged, emotional and informative ride.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin leaves the Australian mainland to discover which of the island-dwelling animals is truly built to survive. First up, he meets the enigmatic green turtle on the Wellesley Islands. Next, he is on KGari (Fraser Island), where he tracks down a pack of the notorious dingoes. Finally, he encounters the formidable and aptly named death adder snake.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin dares into the Australian savannah to find the species most built to survive. First is Australias largest bird of prey, the majestic but intimidating wedge-tailed eagle. Next, Phil tracks down one of the worlds deadliest snakes, the coastal taipan. Finally, Phil faces the uniquely Australian frill-necked lizard, a reptile with fascinating defense mechanisms.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Rule of the kingdom is reserved only for the strong. Five heroes, each with a unique power, head up rival families struggling for power, clawing their way to the top. The winners are rewarded with the richest hunting grounds in the kingdom, but the fate of the losers is brutal - exile or death. Fighting to survive, killing to succeed - nothing will stop them trying to reign supreme over the Savage Kingdom.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi National Park spans over 3,000 square miles of western Tanzania. Lions, hippos and crocodiles live in harmony, until an unusual climatic cycle turns the normal dry season into an extreme drought. Lion cubs face mortal danger from a rogue male lion intent on a takeover, hippos fight viciously for dwindling river territory, and even the crocodiles struggle to survive until the rains arrive.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: Rule of the kingdom is reserved only for the strong. Five heroes, each with a unique power, head up rival families struggling for power, clawing their way to the top. The winners are rewarded with the richest hunting grounds in the kingdom, but the fate of the losers is brutal - exile or death. Fighting to survive, killing to succeed - nothing will stop them trying to reign supreme over the Savage Kingdom.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: She haunts the trees and hills in the heart of the realm. She is solitary, silent and virtually invisible. Saba the leopard is a killer without rival. Saba is the most spectacular and resourceful hunter the Savage Kingdom has seen. Her stronghold, Leopard Rock, sits at the heart of this brutal realm it is a place where she can vanish into the shadows and avoid running into her rivals lions, hyenas and wild dogs. There is no question that Saba the leopard can take care of herself, but her strength and resilience will be cruelly tested when she tries to bring two cubs into the realm where only she can protect and feed them in the midst of the cauldron of warring predators. The ordeal will tear at her heart.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: The sparse African Savannah can be a fearsome place for both herds of powerful prey and the lurking predators who hunt them down. In this captivating documentary series from National Geographic, the relationship between predator and prey is closely examined, exploring the fight for survival for both sets of animals. These herds are full of powerful or agile animals, making the job of a predator to feed itself and its family a troublesome task. But the African predators are ruthless and proficient hunters, and if a herd is infiltrated, or a straggling member is targeted, they will struggle to evade these savage carnivores.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi National Park spans over 3,000 square miles of western Tanzania. Lions, hippos and crocodiles live in harmony, until an unusual climatic cycle turns the normal dry season into an extreme drought. Lion cubs face mortal danger from a rogue male lion intent on a takeover, hippos fight viciously for dwindling river territory, and even the crocodiles struggle to survive until the rains arrive.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavi is in the grips of extraordinary drought. A new litter of lion cubs is born into tough conditions, vulnerable to the attack of a rogue male, intent on taking over the pride. Water levels drop by the day, pushing two hippos to overthrow an alpha bull. Distant storms bring not rain but fire sparked by lightning. In the crushing heat, life desperately struggles to hold out for rain.

programme.title: Katavi - Africas Fallen Paradise
programme.desc: Katavis wetlands are unrecognizable in a prolonged drought, reduced to fetid, overcrowded mud wallows. At last, rains resurrect the river, inch by inch. Tensions wash away as hippos and crocodiles rejoice in the return of deep water … but flooding traps lion cubs in a precarious position. Normality will finally return to Katavi, but amidst global climate change, for how long?

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: Our homes are meant to be safe havens, but wild animals are increasingly showing up uninvited. From bears taking dips in hot tubs to raccoons raiding kitchens and gators on our doorsteps, animals are getting bolder. Are they invading our spaces, or have we taken over theirs? Surveillance footage reveals the surprising ways our wild neighbors are moving in!

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Wild Kind
programme.desc: Every year, more and more people head to the ocean to swim, sail, fish or scuba, and every year, more and more of us experience astonishing wild encounters that go viral. Want to know why an octopus would slap a kayaker or why a sea snake might want to be best friends? Take a deep dive into some of the craziest clips to discover whats really going on.

programme.title: NBA Special
programme.desc: Get the highlights of the untold stories of Scottish basketball. A look back on the fierce rivalry between Edinburgh and Falkirk that started a golden era for the sport in the 1980s, and the success of the national team at the 2018 Commonwealth Games.

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: No kalna izbēdzis āzis izraisa haosu, aprīdams visu, kas pagadās! Bali nekur nav atrodama, un Barbapapa liek lietā savu attapību, meklējot viņu. Viņi pat nenojauš, kāds pārsteigums viņus gaida.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: No Piedzīvojumu līča atbrauc Rokijs, lai apciemotu Rabla komandu. Tieši laikā, lai redzētu Celtnieklīča jauno lācēnu! Kad reindžere Roza lūdz palīdzēt ar celtniecību, Ātrmeistars netīšām iznīcina lāču māju. Ķepaiņiem un Rokijam jāglābj situācija.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gatavojoties Banānu dienai, Gabrielam un Sjerrai Spīdošajai vajag būvnieku palīdzību, tāpēc Rabla komanda ķeras pie darba. Bākuguns vietā Ātrmeistars izgaismo debesis ar savu seju, kad tas nogādā kuģi nepatikšanās, ķepaiņi steidz palīdzēt.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons un viņa draugi nāk talkā konsteblam Velsam, lai atrisinātu pazudušā Vindzoras rubīna lietu. Pateicoties Lūsijas tantes īpašajai receptei, Brauni mājās uzsāk ēdināšanas biznesu, bet tas ir smags darbs.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtonam jāizvēlas starp Angliju un Peru, pirms sākas futbola kausa mačs, taču viņš abas valstis mīl vienādi stipri. Pienācis brīdis tantei Lūsijai doties mājās, bet atlicis laiks vēl pēdējam piedzīvojumam. Vai tomēr ne?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Mēre Greitveja un Dakija Dū kungs vēlas nodemonstrēt savas izpletņlēkšanas prasmes. Taču, kad patraucē vējš, suņi palīdz viņiem lēkt ar izpletni uz zemes! Kad Vīleram un cūkai Trifelei nesanāk slidot, komanda rod risinājumu uz riteņiem!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi atrod vectēva Grants laimīgi boulinga bumbu. Diemžēl Celtnieklīcī nav boulinga zāles... līdz šim! Kad pēkšņa superziedēšana sagūsta Motori, Liliju un Parka Reindžeri Rozu, suņiem jārod ziediem draudzīgs risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala un ģimenes dzīve! Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs aizved Pepu un Džordžu uz rotaļlaukumu, bet nesaprot bērnu noteikumus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Putni apēd vectēva puķu dārzā sēklas. Pepa un Džordžs uztaisa putnubiedēkli, kas aptur putnus. Bet Pepa raizējas, ka putni ir izsalkuši, tāpēc vecmāmiņa sagatavo putniem barotāju ar sēklām.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Zivs Goldija nešķiet laimīga, viņa neēd savu ēdienu, tāpēc Pepa, Džordžs un mamma aizved viņu pie veterināra daktera Kāmja.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Ģimene dodas uz atrakciju parku, bet mamma dusmojas, kad cilvēki pasaka, ka viņa nevarēs laimēt balvas. Džordžs bēdājas, ka minigolfa laukums viņam ir par lielu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem mācās skaitīt, spēlējot spēles Gazeles jaunkundzes centrā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni cenšas tikt uz rotaļlaukumu, bet uz ceļa tiek veikts remonts.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem spēlē paslēpes, bet lapsa Fredijs ar savu ožu ir labākais šajā spēlē.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa mācās svilpot, kad saprot, ka to prot visi, tikai ne viņa.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Dakteris Kāmis ierodas Pepas grupiņā, lai parādītu bērniem mājdzīvniekus. Bet viens no tiem aizbēg. Truša kundze viņu izglābs.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras palīdzību lūdz košā alebrihe Ale. Alebrihu koks ir novītis, tāpēc Dorai jādodas meklēt varavīksnes ūdens. Karstā dienā visi ilgojas pēc saldējuma, bet Valas furgons ir iestidzis smiltīs! Dora iet palīgā, lai visi tiktu pie aukstā našķa.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus? Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz rumpuļiem pagatavot troļļa džemu, pirms Īgnais Trollis pārrodas, lai našķētos. Dorai un Zābaciņam jāatrod un jānoliek vietā burvju kaķītis, kurš visiem draugiem liek uzvesties kā kaķiem!

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Beigas! Barbabravo vairs nav mazulis, viņš ir liels puika!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais izturas dīvaini. Ko viņš slēpj? Barbabērni darīs visu, lai to uzzinātu. Barbapapas izlemj taupīt elektrību, taču viņu ieceri izjauc Barbagudrais un Barbabella, kas izgudrojuši slepenu elektrību patērējošu projektu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu. The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad stirnai Podziņai jāšķērso Celtnieklīča lidostas skrejceļš, Rabls un komanda zina, kas jābūvē. Rabls un komanda uzbūvē milzu skrituļdēli tantes Celtnes un Rivera šovam. Taču, kad tas zaudē kontroli, suņiem jādzenas pakaļ!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcim vajadzīga pasta nodaļa! Bet, kad celtni apsēž vāveres, suņiem jāizdomā risinājums. Rabla komanda izmanto savas būvniecības prasmes, lai pārveidotu super auto mazgātavu un nomazgātu fermeres Zojas sušķīgos dzīvniekus.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda strādā, lai pārvērstu Celtnieklīča pludmales promenādi spožā, svinīgā ziemas brīnumzemē. Kad sniegota diena izjauc Motores un Miksas Virpuļvāveres plānus, Rabla komanda dara to, ko prot vislabāk... būvē.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem un ģimeni gaida braucienu uz pludmali, kur viņi varēs būvēt smilšu pilis, bet, kad viņi ierodas pludmalē, tur ir daudz sniega!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar skolas biedriem izveido laika kapsulu. Katrs tajā ieliek savas mīļākās lietas un aprok to skolas dārzā. Bērni atklāj, ka arī viņu vecāki pirms daudziem gadiem izveidojuši laika kapsulu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mamma vecvecākiem atdod savu veco datoru. Vai viņi mācēs to lietot?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem un Gazeles jaunkundzi apmeklē poniju Pedro, kas nonācis slimnīcā ar salauztu kāju.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs rīko šokolādes olu meklēšanu Pepai un viņas draugiem. Vai sivēntiņi atradīs gardumus?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Trušu jaunkundze ved Pepu un viņas ģimeni izbraucienā ar glābšanas helikopteru.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mazulis Aleksandrs ir par jaunu, lai runātu, līdz Pepa iemāca viņam pirmo vārdiņu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs Suns ved Pepu, Džordžu un suni Deniju apmeklēt vectēva Truša bāku.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Trušu jaunkundze savainojusi potīti, tāpēc viņas māsa un draugi piedāvā aizvietot viņu saldējuma kioskā, lielveikalā un pārējās darba vietās.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Braucot ar riteņiem Barbapapu ģimene atrod viduslaiku pils drupas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Jaunais Fransuā pieredz Barbapapas dzimšanu. Barbatēti iesloga zoodārzā.

Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa

Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš pieskata puķītes Zilo Atsperīgo, Margriezīti un Mazo Rozīti, lai Isa varētu doties uz karalisku tējas pēcpusdienu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz mazajai Andreai atrast burvju lapu, kas ļauj alebrihei saņemt maģiskās spējas.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Bodnieks Gabriels rīko savu gardumu izstādi, un Rabla komanda dodas palīgā.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pirmoreiz bērni brauks ar vilcienu un pavadīs nakti viesnīcā. Barbabo rada lielisku sniegavīru.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis stāsta bērniem par piedzīvojumu ar vilku. Rīt būs barbabērnu pirmā skolas diena.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš atrod Doras pazudušo dzimšanas dienas torti, un visa ģimene sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti! Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz Mēnesnīcai atrast Mēnesspuķi, lai visi varētu priecāties Mēnessgaismas fiestā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Mistera Stingrā dvīņi apciemo barbabērnus. Barbabērni sarīko dvīņiem dārgumu medības un atpūtu dabā. Barbapapas sodas jaunā piedzīvojumā... dārzā. Taču dzīvot dabā ir negaidīti sarežģīti.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo neprot zīmēt. Viņam piemetas žagas, no kurām netiek vaļā. Viņš jau grasās padoties, kad nejauši rada jaunu mākslas novirzienu. Barbaliba grib piedalīties rakstīšanas konkursā, taču brāļi un māsas neļauj koncentrēties.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Tinkle, Ouchie, and Pinkeye must venture back home together after being taken away by mistake. // Patrick gets injured, so his family members take turns hosting the show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphs strength wont save him when hes caught between the Mechazoids and the notorious street gang known as Purple Dragons! Hell have to use his head on this one! ) 09:00 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Dev is bummed at his own birthday party because his dad is off working. Hazel tries to cheer him up by wishing for a pair of rocket boots for him. He is stoked! Then, a party princess arrives, but this is no ordinary party princess, its VICKY from the original series. Meanwhile, Cosmo, Wanda, and Peri stumble into a secret room, where they discover that Dale has been investigating Hazel since Founders Day. Back at the party, Vicky, rotten as ever, forces the kids to make crafts for her online store instead of having fun. Hazel comes up with a plan full of zany traps to stop Vicky and take the party back! When Dev discovers his dad has been researching Hazel instead of spending time with him, Dev lashes out at Hazel and wishes Peri away. Left alone with his anger, is there a devious plan hatching in Devs mind?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must pass Wish Trials in Fairy World to prove theyre a match. Hazel crumbles under pressure, struggling to make a wish confidently, which leads to Cosmo and Wanda failing to grant her half-formed wishes. Consequently, Jorgen reassigns Hazel to a boisterous, no-nonsense fairy named Cookie, who only cares about efficiency, not accuracy. Displeased with the cookie-cutter nature of Cookies magic, Hazel must find a way to confidently wish for Cosmo and Wanda to be her fairies again. // Intimidated by her new classmates, Hazel wishes to be friends with the teachers instead. Once her wish is granted, she and the teachers play around the schoolyard and neglect to prep for the big test coming up. When test day arrives, Hazel realizes her wish has decreased the teachers maturity. Theyre acting like little kids! Hazel has to make a choice-keep her teacher friends and let the whole school fail or change them back and brave making new friends the hard way.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe and her friends face the loss of their school clubs after Max uses the funds to buy himself a hallway golf cart. In retaliation, a mystery prankster starts pulling pranks on Max, who declares he will never give in to his new anonymous nemesis. Instead, Max enlists the help of Principal Bradford from Hiddenville, who knows how to deal with pranksters after years of having Max as a student. While Bradford teaches Max how to deal with school pranks, Chloe admits to Phoebe that she is the mystery prankster, and says she will continue the pranks until Max gives up his golf cart and returns the funds to the clubs. Ultimately feeling defeated by the pranks, Max tells Chloe that he cant continue on their Secret Shores mission, and is returning home a defeated man. Chloe panics, and tells Max the truth, only for Max to reveal he already knew, and was trying to get her to admit the truth. Max agrees to return the cart if Chloe stops her campaign of pranks.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: 10-year-old Hazel Wells has just moved to Dimmadelphia with her family and is struggling with the change. On top of that, her beloved brother, Antony, is away at his first year of college and Hazel is feeling lonely without him. When she has a rocky start at her new school and Antony has to cancel a visit, Hazel tries to run away to visit Antony.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe and her friends face the loss of their school clubs after Max uses the funds to buy himself a hallway golf cart. In retaliation, a mystery prankster starts pulling pranks on Max, who declares he will never give in to his new anonymous nemesis. Instead, Max enlists the help of Principal Bradford from Hiddenville, who knows how to deal with pranksters after years of having Max as a student. While Bradford teaches Max how to deal with school pranks, Chloe admits to Phoebe that she is the mystery prankster, and says she will continue the pranks until Max gives up his golf cart and returns the funds to the clubs. Ultimately feeling defeated by the pranks, Max tells Chloe that he cant continue on their Secret Shores mission, and is returning home a defeated man. Chloe panics, and tells Max the truth, only for Max to reveal he already knew, and was trying to get her to admit the truth. Max agrees to return the cart if Chloe stops her campaign of pranks.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Cosmo and Wanda grant a wish to make Hazels potato project work for the Science Fair, they rewrite the rules of science for the whole universe! When the physical world goes haywire as a result, they cant undo it because not even their magic is not working correctly! And Sci, the Science Fairy, refuses to help Hazel because he does not approve of her shortcut. Hazel must learn the real science behind her potato project to power up Cosmo and Wandas wands and set the universe right again. // After watching a detective TV show with her dad, Hazel wishes she could solve a mystery like a genuine gumshoe. At first, she is wrapped up in the thrill of solving a mystery, but things get real when the landlord goes missing. Everyone is a suspect - kids at school, the strange new neighbors, and even Cosmo and Wanda! Things intensify when Hazel suspects her family is the next target. In a dramatic climax at dinner at her neighbors, Hazel unveils the truth. Is it foul play? Or is it just her imagination?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel, Winn, and Jasmine go to Patty Possums Party Playground, an entertainment fun zone for kids. Hazel wishes the animatronic Patty Possum would come to life. Patty joins the friends for the night and even brings them up to perform on stage! But at closing time, Patty doesnt want to lose her new friends, so she locks them inside the Party Playground. Cosmo and Wandas wands are stuck in the claw machine, so they cant help! They will have to evade this unhinged mascot without magic and find a way out. // Wanting Angela and Marcus to have a romantic anniversary, Hazel wishes that they would "fall in love all over again." When the wish causes her parents to forget each other, Hazel calls on Cupid to make them fall back in love. Upset that Hazel undid his work, Cupid challenges her to a competition in which Hazel and Marcus must compete with Cupid and Angelas old flame, Brewster, for Angelas affection. Can she beat Cupid at his own game and get her parents to fall back in love?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: When Hazel wishes to be 13 so that she can go see a PG-13 movie by herself, Cosmo and Wanda turn her into a teenager. They go the mall and have a blast doing "teenage things" while they wait for the movie. But, as a side effect of her wish, Hazel starts going through the fairy version of puberty: pasta puberty! As she struggles to deal with pesto pimples and mozzarella mood swings, Hazel wishes that Cosmo and Wanda would just get lost! They disappear, leaving Hazel to deal with the zany pasta puberty alone. // Hazel wishes to be a fairy to join Cosmo and Wanda at their Fairy Convention, but since its against Da Rules, she settles on looking like a fairy instead. Once at the con, however, Hazel stumbles into the DMV booth and signs a "Fairy-fication" certificate, turning her into a real fairy! It also brings her anti-fairy into existence, who steals the certificate. Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda must get the certificate back from her anti-fairy, or Hazel will be stuck as a fairy forever!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe is struggling to learn leadership skills, despite Max and Phoebe each trying to teach her their own methods for taking charge of situations. When they learn that a new villain named Stardust is planning to attack the local planetarium the same night as the schools sleepover field trip there, Max and Phoebe agree to chaperone the field trip to catch the bad guy. Stardust, however, gets the upper hand in the planetarium, detonating a device that will bring destruction unless Max and Phoebe figure out how to diffuse it. While the twins do that, Chloe must step up and lead her classmates against Stardusts threat, demonstrating her own leadership style for the first time.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazels feelings are hurt when her friends decide to go to the school dance instead of her book club. She storms off, but then realizes she wants to go to the dance too. Hazel wishes for Kennueth, a half-fish, half-man character from her favorite manga, to come out of his story and take her to the dance. Hazel must get through the dance before Kennueths true form, and magic, are revealed. // Hazel learns about the harmful effects of trash and pollution on Earth, so she wishes that people wouldnt be such trash monsters. Cosmo and Wanda summon a friendly, talking, trash eating dumpster named Danky! Together they spread the word about sustainability and caring for the earth. Then, Dale Dimmadome tricks Danky into helping him sell more products, making people even bigger trash monsters! Hazel must get Danky back and stop Dale Dimmadome in his wasteful tracks.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: At an awards ceremony for Marcus, Hazel wishes the night would be extra special for him. But when her Cosmo and Wanda fidget toys are confiscated by security, Hazel enlists the help of a mysterious janitor to find them - a janitor who turns out to be Denzel Crocker, unrenowned fairy hunter! He vows to capture the fairies for himself, so Hazel goes head-to-head with Crocker in an epic fight to get her fairies back.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Bester unwittingly uncovers the not so delicious goings on in Fritz Fritters top secret Donut Wonderland Factory. // Best and Bester dig up Captain Ironfoots Cursed Amulet on the beach only to find that Deep Sea Belle wants it too.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Inspired by the latest Romcom release at the Movie Theatre, Best and Bester decide to go on a match-making mission. // Toot moves into the Sub with Best and Bester, but they find theres no getting away from her smell - literally!

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester have to find a smart way to make their flight despite not looking like their passport photos. // Best decides to let his sister win "Employee of the Month" for once, but finds that losing doesnt come naturally.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale
programme.desc: The hamsters overhear Dad role-playing as a dastardly knight and believe he has actually turned evil. // Excited to perform as a superhero in Harrys magic show, Mondo must choose between the spotlight and saving Lil Pal.

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: It is pure luck to have a genie to fulfill all wishes, to have two of them is something incredible. Leah is a little girl with a genie bottle necklace, which includes Shimmer and Shine, genie twins. Shimmer is a genie with blue eyes and pink hair, encouraging and passionate, she has a pet, a gibbon monkey Tala. Shine is her twin genie with purple eyes and blue hair, big animal lover. Her pet is a little Bengal tiger Nahal. Zac is Leahs neighbor with red hair and blue eyes, and her best human friend. Leah is making three wishes every day, genies are doing their best but the results are far from perfect, as genies are very young and unskilled. This is the source of awkward and comic situations, but in the end girls manage to get over all difficulties.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets
programme.desc: Rusty Rivets is a fantastic and picturesque animated series about Rusty who lives in Sparkton Hills along with his friend Ruby Ramirez, a robotic tyrannosaurid named Botasaur, and a group of smaller robots known as the Bits. Rusty is a smart inventor and a little genius who with the help of his amazing discoveries helps his friends out of difficulties. Rusty constructs robots of different sizes, forms and purposes, he is in love with science, technology and engineering. Together with his friend Ruby they can repair any old machinery and out-of-date equipment. Their splendid intellect arouses envy and toxic rivals do not play the game clean.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents
programme.desc: The Fairly OddParents tells us a story of Timmy Turner, a 10-year-old boy in the fictional town of Dimmsdale. Vicky is his babysitter with vicious temper. His parents are completely indifferent to him. His life is very sad and hopeless until his fairy godparents Wanda and Cosmo apperar in the fishbowl and try to fulfill his every wish. Timmys greenness in making his wishes causes troubles and he has to "unwish" them together with his fairy godparents to avoid possible disasters. Enjoy Timmys fantastic adventures in the world of fairies, dragons, unicorns and dwarfs.
